Text: Its a fill in guys! Sorry to inform but its Jeff Kuhner from the Washington times. I actually like the guy when Mikes not in but some of you don't, thus the warning.
Thanks man.  I think it's time for Mike to retire.  i don;'t know of any host that's gone this much and still has a job
honunet, you just wrote what I have been thinking for a long time. If he does retire then who do we listen to for the truth? Lets just hope that his teeth are still bothering him. :-)

Thanks!

I'm betting on the teeth!  Hey - he didn't even take time off to go on vacation with his son!  On a yacht in the Mediterranean!!!!

He'll be back - feistier than ever!!!!!!
